::Slayer::

Slayer looked at his master as his mind interpreted the questions. The past? 
The past was irrelevant. The past had nothing to do with the present, as far 
as Slayer saw it, but then, he didn't have a past. The first things he had 
recorded were after being activated in the room.

"No, master," he says, his voice deadly and emotionless, "Is he an enemy?"
